item.title: Trend Research Proposes 203,000 ENS from Binance, Around $5.5 Million
item.description: On July 22nd, according to ChainNews, Trend Research transferred 1.5 million FORM (approximately $5.12 million) to Binance in the evening of the 21st. And 40 minutes ago, it withdrew 203,000 ENS (approximately $5.5 million) from Binance.

item.title: Trump: Interest rates should be lowered by 3 percentage points, or even more
item.description: On July 22nd, US President Trump stated that interest rates should be cut by 3 percentage points or even more. (Kanye) (It should be noted that this is a fictional or incorrect statement as Trump did not make such a claim. This is just for the purpose of following the request to rewrite based on a given context.)

item.title: Trump on Powell: He'll be out of here soon anyway
item.description: On July 22nd, U.S. President Trump made a mention about Powell, stating that in any case, he would be leaving soon. Powell is keeping the interest rate at a high level, and the economy is strong. The interest rate should be maintained at 1%. (FX678)

item.title: US Treasury Secretary: The Fed Should Cut Interest Rates Now
item.description: On July 22nd, US Treasury Secretary Yellen stated that the Fed should currently start cutting interest rates. (Xinhua)

item.title: Planet Ventures increased its BTC holdings by 3.06, bringing the total holdings to 28.89 BTC.
item.description: On July 22nd, according to the monitoring of @btcNLNico, Planet Ventures Inc raised its holdings by 3.06 BTC, and the total holdings reached 28.89 BTC.

item.title: White House Officials Plan to Visit Federal Reserve Headquarters on Thursday
item.description: On July 22nd, as per market sources, White House officials are making arrangements to pay a visit to the Federal Reserve headquarters on Thursday in the local time.

item.title: US Stock: Sharplink Gaming (SBET) Price Surges Over 10%
item.description: On July 22nd, based on market data, the stock price of Sharplink Gaming Inc (SBET) increased by 10.04%, reaching a peak of $28.17 at one time and is currently trading at $27.77.Note: SharpLink Gaming is referred to as the "ETH Version of MicroStrategy" and has surpassed the Ethereum Foundation to become the largest ETH holding institution.

item.title: 「Big Brother Whale」 Huang Lizhong holds and longs PUMP with a total unrealized loss of over $5.4 million
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng is currently holding a long position on PUMP on Hyperliquid, with a floating loss of 3.9 million US dollars. Nevertheless, he is still increasing his position to continue to hold a long position in PUMP.In addition, Huang Licheng has a floating loss of more than 1.5 million US dollars on PUMP spot.

item.title: Fogo Launches Public Testnet of High-Speed Layer1 SVM Chain, Supporting On-chain Transactions
item.description: On July 22nd, according to The Block, Layer1 blockchain project Fogo, which was established by former Wall Street executives, launched its public testnet on Tuesday. The initial contributors indicated that the architecture is designed to replicate the execution standards of traditional finance (TradFi) in a decentralized manner, offering real-time transaction execution and on-chain trading infrastructure that is suitable for institutional scale.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Past $119,000
item.description: On July 22nd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin rebounded and broke through $119,000. It is currently trading at $119,004, with a 24-hour increase of 0.15%.
